bookName: 61The Names of the Prophet, may Allah Bless Him and Grant Him Peace كتاب أسماء النبى صلى الله عليه وسلم

english.hadith:
Malik related to me from Ibn Shihab from Muhammad ibn Jubayr ibn
Mutim that the Prophet, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, said,
"I have five names. I am Muhammad. I am Ahmad. I am al-Mahi (the
effacer), by whom Allah effaces kufr. I am al-Hashir (the gatherer),
before whom people are gathered. I am al-Aqib (the last)."

arabic.hadith: "‏ لِي خَمْسَةُ أَسْمَاءٍ أَنَا مُحَمَّدٌ وَأَنَا أَحْمَدُ وَأَنَا الْمَاحِي الَّذِي يَمْحُو اللَّهُ بِيَ الْكُفْرَ وَأَنَا الْحَاشِرُ الَّذِي يُحْشَرُ النَّاسُ عَلَى قَدَمِي وَأَنَا الْعَاقِبُ ‏"

hadiths.bookName: 61The Names of the Prophet, may Allah Bless Him and Grant Him Peace كتاب أسماء النبى صلى الله عليه وسلم
